channel.title: Aroop Kumar Gochhayat

item.title: About
item.description: Hey there :wave: My name is Aroop and I am a DevOps/Cloud Engineer based out of Banglore. Education :mortar_board: Aug 16 - Jun 19 : Banglore University Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science Skills :computer: Cloud : AWS, GCP, DigitalOcean IaC : Terraform, CrossPlane Orchestration : Kubernetes, Docker, ECS CI/CD : ArgoCD, FluxCD, Gitlab CI, Github Action Monitoring & logging : Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Cloudwatch Service Mesh : Linkerd Work Experience :briefcase: April 22 - Present : Unbxd
